doc:
James Craig (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/James_Craig_(actor) 0 James Craig (born James Henry Meador, February 4, 1912 – June 27, 1985) was an American actor. He is best known for appearances in films like Kitty Foyle and The Devil and Daniel Webster, and his stint as a leading man at Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer in the 1940s where he appeared in films like The Human Comedy. James_Craig ( born James_Henry_Meador , February_4_,_1912 – June_27_,_1985 ) was an_American_actor . He is_best_known for appearances in films like Kitty_Foyle and The_Devil_and_Daniel_Webster , and his_stint as a_leading_man at Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer in the_1940s where he appeared in films like The_Human_Comedy .
